item.title: How to Release a Service
item.description: In this post, I will explain how to release service using Semantic Versioning. What is Service? # In making an application some components make the application run properly. For example in an e-commerce application, there is a login process (login service), after login, we can see the dashboard (dashboard service), and when we want to buy goods we will checkout and make payments (payment service). Login, Dashboard, and Payment are what we call service.
